actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of national medals by the Lake Placid 1980 Olympic Games.

summary.text: Authorizes a certain nonprofit corporation to have medals struck in commemoration of the XIII Olympic Winter Games to be held in Lake Placid, New York in 1980.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of national medals by the Lake Placid 1980 Olympic Games.
